item.title: Some VBA Codes for Formating Tables
item.description: Some VBA Codes for Formating Tables Step 1: In Word -> File -> Options -> Customize Ribbon, check Developer in ‘Customize the ribbon’ and click ok. Step 2: In Ribbons, find and click Developer -> Visual Basic (Alt+F11). Step 3: In the pop out windows, click Module on the Insert tab, copy and paste the following VBA code into the Module window and click the Run tab (F5) to run the macro.
